languages.text: То, сколько раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо может атаковать. Большинство персонажей может совершать только одну атаку за ход, но бывают особые {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} увеличивающие это число.

The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.
languages.original_text: То, сколько раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо может атаковать. Большинство персонажей может совершать только одну атаку за ход, но бывают особые {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} увеличивающие это число.

traits.locale_text: The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are abilities that can increase the attack limit.
The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are abilities that can increase the attack limit.
The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are abilities that can increase the attack limit.

The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.

The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.

languages.text: Die Zahl der Angriffe, die eine Kreatur während ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} ausführen kann. Die meisten Charaktere können nur einen Angriff pro Zug ausführen, aber es gibt {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, die das Angriffslimit erhöhen.
languages.original_text: The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.

traits.locale_text: Die Anzahl der Angriffe, die eine Kreatur in ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} ausführen kann. Die meisten Charaktere können nur einen Angriff pro Zug vortragen, aber es gibt Fähigkeiten, die das Angriffslimit erhöhen können.

languages.text: Nombre d'attaques que peut lancer une créature pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. La plupart des personnages ne peuvent attaquer qu'une fois par tour, mais certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} permettent d'augmenter cette limite.
languages.original_text: The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.

traits.locale_text: Nombre d'attaques que peut lancer une créature pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. La plupart des personnages ne peuvent attaquer qu'une seule fois par tour, mais certaines capacités permettent d'augmenter le nombre maximum d'attaques par tour.

languages.text: 生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可以攻击的次数。绝大多数角色每回合只能攻击一次，但部分{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以解除这个限制。
languages.original_text: The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.

traits.locale_text: 生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可以攻击的次数。绝大多数角色每回合只能攻击一次，但部分能力可以解除这个限制。

languages.text: El número de veces que una criatura puede atacar en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. La mayoría de personajes solo pueden atacar una vez por turno, pero hay {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} que aumentan el límite de ataques.
languages.original_text: The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.

traits.locale_text: El número de veces que una criatura puede atacar en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. La mayoría de personajes solo pueden atacar una vez por turno, pero hay capacidades que aumentan el límite de ataques.

languages.original_text: How many times per turn {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g} a creature can attack. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are special abilities that increase this number.

languages.text: 生物がその{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に攻撃できる回数。ほとんどのキャラクターは1ターンに1回しか攻撃できないが、攻撃回数を増やせる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}もある。
languages.original_text: The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.

traits.locale_text: 生物がその{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に攻撃できる回数。ほとんどのキャラクターは1ターンに1回しか攻撃できないが、攻撃回数を増やせるアビリティもある。

languages.text: Bir yaratığın kendi {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} içerisinde yapabileceği saldırı sayısı. Çoğu karakter bir turda yalnızca bir saldırı gerçekleştirebilirken bu saldırı sınırını artıran {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g} de mevcuttur.
languages.original_text: The number of times a creature can attack on its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Most characters can only make one attack per turn, but there are {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that can increase the attack limit.
